enginesDescription.node: vercel uses this value to select which node version to use. string must match vercel options exactly to silence warnings.

dependenciesDescription.bs-platform: This a regular dependency because the included standard libraries are used during runtime
dependenciesDescription.next-mdx-remote: Allows for directly invoking mdxjs markdown conversion during nextjs data fetching

scriptsDescription.build: at present, next export is only used to ensure that we strictly use static site functionality
scriptsDescription.next:start: TODO: use http-server or similar with the output of next:export instead of next:start
scriptsDescription.next-transpile-modules: used to convert rescript libraries from commonjs to es6 in nextjs builds
scriptsDescription.rescript:format: bsc -format doesn't support in place updates, so we need to use sponge
